NAME: pogoda
DESCRIPTION: Display current weather forecast in shell.

NAME: extract-clip
DESCRIPTION: Simple wrapper for ffmpeg to extract media clips.

NAME: github-init
DESCRIPTION: Set up new GitHub repo in git directory.

NAME: wslpath
DESCRIPTION: [wsl] Utility tool for translating unix paths to WSL and the oposite (i.e. /mnt/c/sth/ <-> C:\sth\).

NAME: neovim-clipboard-wsl-set
DESCRIPTION: [wsl] Utility that set up Windows clipboard to neovim.
